metadata.title: CVE-2014-4165 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ntop allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via the title parameter in a listaction to plugins/rrdPlugin.

criterions.comment: ntop: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
